home.title: Hello, I'm
home.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
home.description:
I am a full stack developer with three years of experience building web applications, with a focus on creating efficient and scalable solutions.
My tech stack includes React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, allowing me to work on both frontend and backend development.
I have experience developing interactive interfaces, designing RESTful APIs, and using Git and GitHub for version control.
In addition, I have strong teamwork and communication skills, enabling me to collaborate effectively in agile projects.
I am constantly learning and always looking for new technologies and innovations to improve my skills and bring value to every project.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a developer with experience in modern technologies
